++ Relative Paths Examples
    ----
    *Home* = \file:///H|/My%20wiki's/Wikidpad/Example[rel://files/demo/My%20wiki's.png>ar]
    * \rel://notes.txt
        = \file:///H|/My%20wiki's/Wikidpad/Example/notes.txt
    * \rel://files/images/w3schools.png
        = \file:///H|/My%20wiki's/Wikidpad/Example/files/images/w3schools.png

    * \rel://../license.txt
        = \file:///H|/My%20wiki's/Wikidpad/license.txt
    * \rel://../Images/notepad.png
        = \file:///H|/My%20wiki's/Wikidpad/Images/notepad.png
    * \rel://../Testwiki/files/codesnippet.txt
        = \file:///H|/My%20wiki's/Wikidpad/Testwiki/files/codesnippet.txt
    * \rel://../../tiddlyWiki/tiddlyWiki.html
        = \file:///H|/My%20wiki's/tiddlyWiki/tiddlyWiki.html
    * \rel://../../../someFile.ext
        = \file:///H|/someFile.txt
    * \rel://../../../../someFile.ext
        = \file:///H|/someFile.txt


    * \rel:///bootlog.txt
        = \file:///*C*|/bootlog.txt
    * \rel:///Windows/notepad.exe
        = \file:///*C*|/Windows/notepad.exe

    ----
[:rel:back]
